pullRequest.title: Add a Toggle to the Status Bars w/ a Delay to show only in Combat
pullRequest.bodyText:
Duplicate of #7445 due to Orphaned Source branch.
Upon many emails and several requests to fix the review suggestions made by @Nightfirecat in #7445 , I came back to clean up those review items in hopes to have this merged into a release for all those people that have asked.
Duplicate PR content:
This is to only show the Status Bars only when in Combat, and hides it based on the delay set.
Closes #7436
Toggle Demo: https://gyazo.com/ee277e5f0d4bfad598a7a1049d972a67
Delay Demo: https://gyazo.com/421e2a4a725725f1b7b5e62f96a6a8a3

nodes.bodyText: This should mention that 0 will mean bars are always shown
This field isn't accessed outside this class. Why does it have a getter?

Game ticks would be a better unit of measurement since that's the unit of time this change actually operates on. That would also let you drop the Instant.now() duration comparisons in favor of using client.getTickCount().
startUp() should be removed if it contains no code.
